submission_guidelines: All submissions must be in English, original, and not under review or published elsewhere.
Papers must conform to the Springer LNCS formatting guidelines.
Accepted papers will be published in a Lecture Notes in Computer Science (LNCS) proceedings volume.
At least one author of each accepted paper must register for the workshop and present the work.
